Circular No. 21/ 2006 
 
Subject:-   Corrigendum to AVSEC Order No. 6/2000 regarding  Hijack 
Threat Contingency Plan. 
 
 
Please refer to this Bureau AVSEC Order No. 6/2000 dated 15.11.2000 on 
the subject cited above. 
 
2. 
Para No. III (i) of the above AVSEC Order “No need to take any action 
while aircraft in flight” is deleted. 
 
3. 
In place of the above, the following para may be inserted: 
 
“When credible threat information is received about a possible act of 
unlawful interference while aircraft is in flight, the Pilot-in-Command (PIC) 
shall be informed by the concerned aircraft operator and ATC”. 
 
 
 
(M. Malaviya) 
Addl. Commissioner of  Security (CA)
